div.head: Title of this file: Mary Russell Mitford's Notebook of 1819 to 1823
List of all elements in play in the body of this file, and sort by count from most to least used.

listBibl.bibl: Dr. Aikin's Translation of the Memoirs of Huet
Duchesse d'Angoulime's journal while in the Temple
Got the Sheffield Iris from Mrs. Hofland with some verses from her to me -- very pretty.
the Reviews the B.C. & the E.R.
Wrote a sonnet & letter to Mrs. Dickinson

event.label: Date of this event: 1818-12-31
event.note: a dance

event.label: Date of this event: 1819-01-03
event.note: the Ball

event.label: Date of this event: 1819-01-26
event.note: bought my new crimson bombazine

event.label: Date of this event: 1819-01-26
event.note: Poor Whim lost

event.label: Date of this event: 1819-01-29
event.note: Whim found again.

event.label: Date of this event: 1819-01-29
event.note: Selim nearly killed a white kitten we have got for Sir W. Elford.

event.label: Date of this event: 1819-01-31
event.note: Dear Drum came back again.

event.label: Date of this event: 1819-02-11
event.note: Walked about Farley Hill -- Mrs. Dick. brought me & Mrs. Hofland home & dined with us -- Mrs. H. went away at night.

event.label: Date of this event: 1819-02-13
event.note: Went to Reading -- called on Mrs. Tuppin -- the Brookes -- Mrs. Boyd -- Mrs. Newberry & the Valpy's -- saw a great many people & hired a Cook.

event.label: Date of this event: 1819-02-15
event.note: Mr. Williams called on me

event.label: Date of this event: 1819-02-15
event.note: On this day (Monday the 15th) Papa saw a pheasant's nest with 4 eggs, which was found by one of Lord Braybrooke's people at Billingbear whilst a party were coursing in the park -- very early indeed.

event.label: Date of this event: 1819-02-21
event.note: Dear Drum went into Hampshire.

event.label: Date of this event: 1819-02-22
event.note: a new little bitch called Fly given us by young farmer Webb

event.label: Date of this event: 1819-02-25
event.note: dear Drum & the pets came back from Overton

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-04
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? wrote to Miss James--letter not to go this week

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-04
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? And to Miss Brooke

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-08
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Wrote to Sir William Elford not to go till next week

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-10
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Wrote to Miss Webb-- not to go till Tuesday

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-11
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? wrote a letter to Mr. Haydon

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-12
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? letters to Sir W. Elford

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-12
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Mr. Haydon

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-12
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Miss James

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-12
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Miss Webb

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-13
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Wrote a sonnet & letter to Mrs. Dickinson

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-14
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Wrote to dear Miss James

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-15
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? finish my letter to dear Miss James

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-19
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Wrote a long note to Miss Brooke

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-20
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? began an answer

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-22
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? finished my packet for Mrs. Rowden

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-24
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? answered it

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-27
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? letters to Mrs. Rowden

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-27
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Miss James

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-31
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? wrote to her in answer

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-12
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? wrote to Mr. Williams

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-12
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Miss Eliza Webb

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-14
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Wrote to Mrs. Clarke

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-14
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Miss Ogbourn

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-14
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Miss James

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-15
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? wrote to Sir William Elford

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-21
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Wrote to Eliza Webb

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-21
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Mrs. Hofland

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-26
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? wrote to Miss Booth

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-27
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Wrote to Sir W.E.

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-27
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Miss James

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-28
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? wrote to Pen Valpy

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-28
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Eliza Webb

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-03-02
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? wrote to Mary Webb

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-03-02
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Pen Valpy

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-03-02
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? letter to Sir W.E.

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-03-02
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? finished a letter to Miss James

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-03-03
event.note: Who is Mitford writing to? Sent of my letter to Miss James

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-12
event.note: Who has sent Mitford a letter? heard from dear Mrs.Dickinson

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-13
event.note: Who has sent Mitford a letter? Heard from dear Miss James

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-17
event.note: Who has sent Mitford a letter? had a charming letter from Mr. Haydon

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-20
event.note: Who has sent Mitford a letter? Recieved a long letter from Mrs. Rowden

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-01-24
event.note: Who has sent Mitford a letter? Got a letter from dear Miss James

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-11
event.note: Who has sent Mitford a letter? Heard from Sir W. Elford

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-18
event.note: Who has sent Mitford a letter? Had a note from Miss Valpy.

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-20
event.note: Who has sent Mitford a letter? Got the Sheffield Iris from Mrs. Hofland with some verses from her to me -- very pretty.

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-27
event.note: Who has sent Mitford a letter? Had a delightful letter from Sir William Elford enclosing some lozenges of his own making.

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-28
event.note: Who has sent Mitford a letter? Heard from Mr. Haydon

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-02-28
event.note: Who has sent Mitford a letter? heard from Mary Webb

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-03-01
event.note: Who has sent Mitford a letter? Heard from Pen Valpy

event.label: Date of Journal entry: 1819-03-02
event.note: Who has sent Mitford a letter? Heard from Miss James
